ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Start an import
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Start an import
ActivityMetadata.Description: Start a source import to a GitHub repository using GitHub Importer.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Start an import

Start a source import to a GitHub repository using GitHub Importer.

Method: Put

OperationID: migrations/start-import

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/import
